translation: All beings, O Arjuna, go into My Nature at the end of a Kalpa; I send them forth again at the beginning of the next Kalpa.
commentary: 9.7 All beings all beings? Kaunteya Or Kaunteya? Prakritim to Nature? go go? My? My? at the end of the Kalpa? Again again? Those them? at the beginning of the Kalpa? I release send forth? I am I.Commentary Prakriti The inferior one or the lower Nature composed of the three alities? Sattva? Rajas and Tamas.Just as the grass grows from the earth and dries up in the earth? just
